NEWS

OCTOBER 6, 2025 FIVENINE OPTICS

COMING SOON: SHORT RADIUS SUPERPOLISHED SUBSTRATES

Due to increasing demand, we're expanding our product line to include superpolished substrates with shorter radii — in the 10–25 mm range (currently our shortest is 50 mm).

We're fine-tuning specifications and would love your input.

Please take a moment to complete our short survey so we can better understand your needs:

https://forms.gle/w1Q4i4ryHYM3mjd2A

Your feedback will directly shape the next generation of precision optics at FIVENINE Optics.

JOIN THE TEAM

At Five Nine Optics, we're passionate about precision, innovation, and craftsmanship. We specialize in high-performance optical coatings and cutting-edge thin film technology—and we're growing. If you're looking to be part of a dedicated team that values expertise, collaboration, and quality, we invite you to explore our current job openings below. Come help us push the boundaries of optical excellence.

OPEN POSITIONS

JOB DESCRIPTION:

We are currently looking to hire a qualified candidate to perform the following job duties:

  • Clean and inspect optics for IBS thin film deposition. This includes spin cleaning and hand cleaning.
  • Cleaning and inspection of optics after IBS thin film deposition.
  • Operation of high magnification microscopes.
  • Operation of Veeco IBS thin film deposition systems.
  • Operation of spectrophotometers.
  • General lab cleaning.
  • Occasional bead blasting.
  • Occasional cleaning and re-foiling of coating chambers.

QUALIFICATIONS:

  • 0-5 years experience in this field or a transferable skillset.
  • Experience with Veeco Spector systems preferred.
  • High school diploma or equivalent
  • Ability to read and understand work instructions.

APPLY TO: EVAN@FIVENINEOPTICS.COM

Job description coming soon.

HOW TO APPLY

If you're interested in joining our team, please send your resume to the address provided above. Be sure to include the job title you're applying for in the subject line. We look forward to hearing from you!

TERMS & CONDITIONS

ORDER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT:

Buyer's placement and Five Nine Optic's (FNO) acknowledgement of Order shall constitute acceptance of these terms.

Prices, Taxes, and Surcharges: Prices are FOB Origin (Boulder, CO). FNO will ship via Buyer's method, carrier, and account number. Buyer shall bear cost of freight, insurance, handling, and other duties levied on shipment of Products. Buyer shall be responsible for reporting and paying all taxes. Credit card orders are subject to a 4% surcharge.

PAYMENT TERMS:

Terms of payment are net thirty (30) days from the date of FNO's invoice. All payments to be made in US$.

DELIVERY:

All deliveries are FOB Origin (Boulder), and all risk of loss or damage to Products in transit is upon Buyer. Title shall pass to Buyer upon delivery.

TOOLING AND FIXTURES:

Tooling and fixtures required to manufacture Products are property of FNO and shall remain as such upon completion of order. Invoices for fixtures, tooling, and other NRE do not convey any title to Buyer unless so specified in the Order.

LIMITED WARRANTY:

FNO warrants that the Products as delivered shall be free from material defects in materials and workmanship for twelve months from shipment date.

CUSTOMER FURNISHED MATERIAL:

FNO shall not be liable for any loss of or damage to property or materials provided to FNO in connection with the Order, except for loss or damage caused solely by FNO's gross negligence.
